snippet.title: HEROIC - Magic Duel, Game Preview
snippet.description:
Fight through battle arenas as you level up your Hero, in this PvP strategy game. 

FREE iOS download: https://norde.us/playheroic
FREE Android download: https://norde.us/playheroic
#playheroic 

Highlighted Game Features:

☆ Play epic and intense real time PvP battles in a fantasy world
☆ Awaken and level up Your Hero
☆ Collect Minions and Build your winning deck
☆ Destroy enemy Portals, earn trophies and climb the leaderboard

★ Unique Heroes ★ Epic Pvp Battles ★ High Fantasy

- Heroic is a mobile game created by Nordeus. -


Subscribe for more Heroic videos!
